DECLARE @ordernummer INT = 529630
DELETE from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysAanlev] DELETE from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo]
INSERT INTO [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysAanlev] ([crediteur] ,[factuurnummer] ,[orddat] ,[inkooporderregel] ,[inkooporder] ,[artikelnummer] ,[huidigeAantal] ,[huidigeLeverdatum] ,[huidigeDatum] ,[huidigePrijs] ,[nieuwAantal] ,[nieuweLeverdatum] ,[nieuwePrijs] ,[deellevering] ,[leverdatumDeellevering] ,[medewerker] ,[syscreated] ,[sysmodified]) SELECT ord_debtor_name ,'12345' ,orddat ,regel ,ltrim(r.ordernr) ,artcode ,esr_aantal ,PlannedDate ,PlannedDate ,prijs_n ,esr_aantal ,PlannedDate ,prijs_n ,0 ,getdate() ,1610 , getdate() , getdate()
FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].Orkrg (nolock) k JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].Orsrg (nolock) r ON r.ordernr = k.ordernr WHERE r.ordernr = @ordernummer

SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN x.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) AS l(v) OUTER apply (SELECT r.id FROM [%abeiserver%].[%abeidb%].[dbo].[_ab_entity_log] AS r with (nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.runid != '%runid%' AND r.syscreated > Dateadd(hour, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT rl.id FROM [%abeiserver%].[%abeidb%].[dbo].[_ab_entity_log] AS rl WITH (nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND rl.runid = r.runid AND rl.jobid = r.jobid AND rl.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job' ) AS x

-- Selecteer te verwerken levering
INSERT INTO [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] ( ordernr , orsrgID , action , artcode , line , esr_aantal , huidigeAantal , nieuwAantal , aantal , crediteur ,[factuurnummer] ,[orddat] ,[inkooporderregel] ,[inkooporder] ,[artikelnummer] ,[huidigeLeverdatum] ,[huidigePrijs] ,[nieuweLeverdatum] ,[nieuwePrijs] ,[deellevering] ,[leverdatumDeellevering] ,[medewerker] ,[instruction] ,[syscreatedScansys] ,[runid] ,[jobid] ,[seqno] ,[jobstepid] ,[Rowstatus] )
select ol.ordernr , case when l.line = 1 then ol.id else 0 end as orsrgID , case when l.line = 1 then 'EDIT' else 'ADDNEW' end as action , ol.artcode , l.line , ol.esr_aantal , al.huidigeAantal , al.nieuwAantal , l.aantal , al.crediteur , al.factuurnummer , al.orddat , al.inkooporderregel , substring (space(8) + al.inkooporder , len(space(8) + al.inkooporder) - 7, 8) as inkooporder , al.artikelnummer , al.huidigeLeverdatum , al.huidigePrijs , l.datum , al.nieuwePrijs , al.deellevering , al.leverdatumDeellevering , al.medewerker , case when l.line = 1 then case when ol.instruction is NOT null then concat (al.factuurnummer COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, ' // ', ol.instruction) else al.factuurnummer end else NULL end as instruction , al.syscreated , '%runid%' , %jobid% , %seqno% , %jobstepid% , 0
from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg as ol (nolock) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysAanlev] as al (nolock) on ol.ordernr = substring (space(8) + al.inkooporder , len(space(8) + al.inkooporder) - 7, 8) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT and ol.regel = al.inkooporderregel COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT
CROSS APPLY (VALUES(1, al.nieuwAantal, al.nieuweLeverdatum),(2, case when al.deellevering = 1 then al.huidigeAantal - al.nieuwAantal else 0 end, al.leverdatumDeellevering)) l(line, aantal, datum) where 1=1 --and --( -- --(l.aantal != ol.esr_aantal) -- --or (sl.huidigeLeverdatum != sl.nieuweLeverdatum) -- --or (sl.huidigePrijs != sl.nieuwePrijs) --) and l.aantal != 0 and al.runid is null
step.stepname: Verplaats alle nieuwe leveringen naar ToDo

step.datasource:
-- Update runid in aanlev
UPDATE [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysAanlev] SET runid = '%runid%'
from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysAanlev] al (nolock)
WHERE exists (select factuurnummer from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] td (nolock) where 1=1 AND td.runid = '%runid%' AND td.factuurnummer = al.factuurnummer)

-- controle op nieuwe levering nieuw heeft voorang op retry
IF ((SELECT count(*) FROM [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] where rowstatus = 0) > 0) BEGIN -- geef een nieuwe de status 1 in behandeling. UPDATE [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] set rowstatus = 1 , retrycount = isnull (retrycount, 0) + 1 , runid = '%runid%' FROM [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] WHERE 1=1 and rowstatus = 0 and inkooporder = (select top 1 inkooporder from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] (nolock) where 1=1 AND rowstatus = 0 order by Id) END ELSE BEGIN -- probeer om een retry op status 1 in behandeling te zetten UPDATE [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] set rowstatus = 1 , runid = '%runid%' , retrycount += 1 FROM [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] WHERE 1=1 and rowstatus = -1 and inkooporder = (select top 1 inkooporder from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] (nolock) where 1=1 AND rowstatus = -1 -- AND retryTime <= getdate() AND retrycount <= %param_RetryTimes% order by Id) END
select top 1 0 as DoQuit from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] (nolock) where 1=1 AND rowstatus = 1

-- update orderlines
SELECT td.orsrgID as ID, o.ordernr as HeaderID, td.orsrgID as ReferenceValue -- benodigde velden voor het kunnen updaten van een orderline de controle. , td.action as Action , td.aantal as esr_aantal , td.nieuweLeverdatum as afldat , td.nieuwePrijs as Prijs_n , td.nieuwePrijs as prijs83 , td.instruction as instruction , td.artcode as artcode
FROM [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] td (nolock) JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[orsrg] as o (nolock) on td.inkooporder = o.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT and td.inkooporderregel = o.regel COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT
WHERE 1 = 1 AND td.runid = '%runid%' AND td.rowstatus = 1

-- Header line
SELECT magcode , ordernr as HeaderID , ordernr , ID as ReferenceValue FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[Orkrg] (nolock) WHERE ordernr = ( SELECT TOP 1 inkooporder FROM [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] (nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 and runid = '%runid%' and rowstatus = 1 ) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT

-- update logging
update td set td.rowstatus = case when isnull(r.rowstatus, -1) = 2 then 2 else -1 end , td.sysmessage = case when isnull(r.rowstatus, -1) = 2 then CONCAT(td.sysmessage, ' | Processed') else concat(td.sysmessage, ' | Processing failed: ', r.errormessage collate database_default) end , td.sysmodified = current_timestamp --select * from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] td (nolock) left outer join [%abeidb%].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] r (nolock) on r.runid = td.runid and r.Action = 'update' and r.Entity = 'PurchaseOrderHeader' where 1=1 and td.runid = '%runid%' and td.rowstatus = 1

-- fiatteren
select top 1 td.ordernr from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] td join [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[orkrg] (nolock) o on o.ordernr = td.inkooporder COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where 1=1 AND o.fiattering = 'N' -- allen dan fiatteren, het is togle functie AND td.deellevering = 0 -- allen dan fiatteren, het is togle functie AND td.rowstatus = 2 -- wijziging moet gelukt zijn and runid = '%runid%'

-- Afdrukken
select top 1 td.ordernr , 1 as isFinal , 2 as PrintDestination , 'PODSVAIR' as PrintLayout
from [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] td join [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[orkrg] (nolock) o on o.ordernr = td.inkooporder COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where 1=1 AND o.ordbv_afgd = 0 -- maar niet als hij op dit moment afgedrukt is AND td.deellevering = 0 -- allen dan fiatteren, het is togle functie AND td.rowstatus = 2 -- wijziging moet gelukt zijn and runid = '%runid%'

-- retry mail versturen
-- Let op gegevens uit Exact halen.
SELECT DISTINCT factuurnummer, inkooporder, crediteur , hum.mail , case when hum.mail is not null then hum.mail else '%param_DefaultMailTo%' end as emailto -- , '%param_MailToNaam%' as naam
FROM [ABEI_PURCHASE].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ScansysToDo] td (nolock) left JOIN [001].[dbo].[humres] hum on hum.res_id = td.medewerker
WHERE 1=1 -- AND runid = '%runid%' -- AND retrycount > %param_RetryTimes%
